entry.title: Who's There? Building a home security system with Pi & Slack!
entry.summary:
Description

How does one make use of that raspberry pi they bought years ago? This talk will summarize how you can turn your raspberry pi into a home security system, utilizing slack as a notifications and control system.

Presentation page -- https://2018.pycon.ca/talks/talk-PC-55476 Project page -- https://github.com/ian-whitestone/rpi-security-system
